article.title: BIBCON - A General Purpose Software System for MARC-Based Book CatalogProduction
article.author: Gibson, Liz
article.text: The BIBCON file management system, designed for use on IBM 360 system equipment, performs two basic functions: (1) it creates MARC structured, bibliographic records from untagged input data; (2) from these records it produces page image output for book catalogs.. The system accepts data from several different input devices and can produce a variety of output formats by line printer, photocomposition, or computer output microform (COM)..
